com.hxgraph.adapter

接口 IGraphAdapter<T extends PointCollectionImp,P extends IStrategyParamsImp>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BarGraphAdapter, BoolGraphAdapter, DotToLineAdapter, GraphAdapterImp, HXKLineAdapter, KLineAdapter, MagicWaveGraphAdapter, RedGreenGraphAdapter, StockBarGraphAdapter, StockHistoryClosedGraphAdapter, StockHistoryGraphAdapter, VolumeGraphAdapter

    public interface IGraphAdapter<T extends PointCollectionImp,P extends IStrategyParamsImp>
    用于提供原始数据解析以及封装为绘图数据结构的 适配器接口 Created by liulinru on 2017/4/20.

      向适配器设入原始数据源
